Title: It's Never Over
Writer: Courtney Kemp Agboh (created by), Gary Lennon, Vladimir Cvetko (executive story editor), Safia Dirie (story editor), Jeff Dix (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: Ghost deals with loose ends before tangling with some new nightlife competition. Tommy confronts Tash, who must learn to coexist with Angela. Later, Tommy finds an adviser in a former lover.
